column5: I will be in canada first week of july. this is my first trip with howey bay camps. we will be on odin lake which is one of there outposts. looking for any helpfull info.

I have used Howey Bay camps 2 times to go to Little Vermillion. Large and numerous pike,many small walleyes. Cabins functional equipment marginal to acceptable. I have since found full service lodges with better equipment and similar prices. I understand ownership has changed recently(last year or so) Bev Chaney used to own it. Now I believe one of his children runs it. sidewinder
